name: root
description: A monorepo for all npm packages in the Tasit ecosystem

scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run boostrap && npx lerna publish
scripts.clean: rm ./node_modules -rf && npx lerna clean --yes && npx lerna run clean:3rd-parties --scope tasit-contracts
scripts.bootstrap: npm run clean && npm i && npx lerna bootstrap
scripts.ganache:start: npx ganache-cli -m 'beach swap combine paper music cook electric bullet trust actress liquid asthma' --gasLimit 1000000000 --host 0.0.0.0 > /dev/null 2>&1 &
scripts.ganache:stop: kill `ps ax|grep ganache-cli|grep -v grep| awk '{print $1}'` 2> /dev/null; exit 0
scripts.pretest: npm run ganache:stop && npm run ganache:start && npm run truffle:migrate

author: Tasit Labs
